title: Bitcoin targets $48K in 'spot-driven' BTC price rally
description:
Bitcoin sees its highest levels since early April 2022, but shorters are well-prepared for ETF volatility.

Bitcoin (BTC) hit new 21-month highs on Jan. 2 as excitement returned to crypto markets in the Asia trading session.

Data from Cointelegraph Markets Pro and TradingView showed BTC price strength building as the new year holiday period ended.

Amid renewed excitement over the United States’ first spot Bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF), BTC/USD gathered steam to hit $45,922 on Bitstamp.

Read more

title: Salus Publishes 2023 Web3 Security Landscape Report
description: Salus's 22023 Web3 Security Landscape Report highlights more than $1.7 billion in losses due to access control problems, phishing, flash loan attacks, and reentrance.

title: Disney’s vintage Mickey Mouse stars in OpenSea’s NFT marketplace
description: The iconic character from Walt Disney Company’s early animation history, Mickey Mouse, specifically in his 1928 appearance in “Steamboat Willie,” has officially entered the public domain.  This event marks a significant milestone in copyright history, as the character’s original version becomes freely available to the public after the expiration of the 95-year copyright term.  “Steamboat […]

title: Corrupt Chinese officials exploit crypto for illicit cross-border transactions
description: Chinese media are repeating concerns about the use of cryptocurrencies to facilitate corruption. title: André Dragosch says Ethereum will outperform Bitcoin in 2024; analysts forecast Meme Moguls prices
description: Ethereum might outperform Bitcoin in 2024. Meanwhile, another analyst is bullish on Meme Moguls in the ongoing MGLS presale

title: Defi TVL surpasses $55b as crypto market continues to surge
description: The decentralized finance (defi) total value locked (TVL) records impressive gains as the broader crypto market rallies. According to data provided by Defi Llama, the global defi TVL rose by roughly $2 billion in the past 24 hours, reaching $55.34…

title: Polkadot Embraces Upcoming Memecoin $DED with Overwhelming Support – Will This Drive DOT to New ATH?
description: Polkadot has played host to the rise of a new memecoin DED. Speculation now mounts that DED can help trigger a more massive run in the price of DOT.
